title: Complex Arc Tangent Function
description:
CATAN calculates the arc tangent of a complex number
The range of values of the result is between [-/2,+/2 ] For the imagina￾ry part.
name: CATAN

output.name: CATAN
output.description: The result of the arc tangent calculation, returned as a complex number.

return_value.description: The complex result representing the arc tangent of the input complex number.

fields.name: re
fields.description: The real part of the arc tangent result.

fields.name: im
fields.description: The imaginary part of the arc tangent result.
